attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM has waged aggressive war on another nation. His justification to do so - that Iraq had WMD - indicates at best a complete lack of judgement; more probably a shameful lack of integrity. His actions have caused the deaths of British soldiers - cannon fodder for Blair's vanity - and of thousands of Iraqi civilians.

rejection.details:
Your petition is identical to this one:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/resignTony/
And a number of others raise similar points as your own. If you still wish to have your own petition launced, please resubmit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
